text:
It would be useful to see the content of the documents "title" attribute in the  
"Go"/"History" menu to allow distinguishing documents with the same name. 
  
See discussion at  
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/xmlgraphics-batik-users/200604.mbox/<444DF3C0.3040402%40karto.baug.ethz.ch>  
  
Thanks
creator: neumann@karto.baug.ethz.ch

text: forgot to mention that this applies to the Squiggle component.
creator: neumann@karto.baug.ethz.ch
